articles.title: North-South High-level Urgent Contact Held
articles.content:
North-South High-level Urgent Contact Held
Panmunjom, August 24 (KCNA) -- A north-south high-level urgent contact which had started at Panmunjom last Saturday ended Monday.
					 Present there from the north side were Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Kim Yang Gon, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and from the south side were Kim Kwan Jin, chief of the State Security Office of Chongwadae, and Hong Yong Phyo, minister of Unification.
					
					 At the contact the north and the south had an in-depth discussion of the principled issues arising in defusing military confrontation, preventing conflict and promoting the development of the bilateral relations, and made public the following joint press release:
					
					 A north-south high-level urgent contact was held at Panmunjom from August 22 to 24, 2015.
					
					 Present there from the north side were Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and from the south side were Kim Kwan Jin, chief of the State Security Office of Chongwadae, and Hong Yong Phyo, minister of Unification.
					
					 Both sides discussed the issues of defusing the acute military tension that aggravated recently between the north and the south and bettering the north-south ties and made public the following agreement:
					
					 1. The north and the south agreed to hold talks between their authorities in Pyongyang or Seoul at an early date to improve the north-south ties and have multi-faceted dialogue and negotiations in the future.
					
					 2. The north side expressed regret over the recent mine explosion that occurred in the south side's area of the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL), wounding soldiers of the south side. 
					
					 3. The south side will stop all loudspeaker propaganda broadcasts along the MDL from 12:00, August 25 unless an abnormal case occurs.
					
					 4. The north side will lift the semi-war state at that time.
					
					 5. The north and the south agreed to arrange reunions of separated families and relatives from the north and the south on the occasion of the Harvest Moon Day this year and continue to hold such reunions in the future, too and to have a Red Cross working contact for it early in September.
					
					 6. The north and the south agreed to vitalize NGO exchanges in various fields.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 55th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 55th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday to mark the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Pak Yong Sik and other leading officials of the party, state and army, chairperson of a friendly party, members of party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments and labor innovators in Pyongyang.
					
					 Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) marked a historic event of heralding the steady inheritance of the revolutionary cause of Songun and the start of his Songun leadership, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 With this historic day the Songun revolution is given a steady continuity and the KPA develops into the army of the leader and party and a new era of the Juche revolution is ushered in, emerging victorious under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Leading the fierce military confrontation against the imperialists on the forefront for over 50 years, Kim Jong Il prioritized the military affairs above anything else and regarded the KPA as the pillar and main force of the Songun revolution to defend socialism despite obstacles that were laid in the way ahead of the revolution.
					
					 His inspection of the Dwarf Pine Post in the mid-1990s when the U.S. imperialists went to extremes in their moves to stifle the country was a declaration of his unshakeable will to hold fast to revolutionary arms and keep going along the road of Songun until the imperialists are perished on the earth.
					
					 Kim Jong Il clarified the philosophy on arms that the revolution is pioneered, advances and is accomplished by dint of arms and the principle of Songun that the army precisely means the party, state and people, formulating and systematizing the theory of Songun politics. 
					
					 Under his energetic leadership the KPA developed into the elite army strong in ideology and faith and the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army which defended the leader unto death while the national defence industry grew enough to manufacture any cutting-edge weapons as it wishes.
					
					 He made sure that the entire army was modernized and all the people were put under arms at a new high level and an all-people and nation-wide defence system was established. Thus, our country has turned into an impregnable fortress for self-defence that no invaders dare provoke.
					
					 He worked heart and soul with patriotic will to build up invincible military muscle and achieve the great unity of the servicepersons and people and heighten the dignity of the country and people to the utmost in the national history under the banner of Songun. His exploits will shine for all ages.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary idea and exploits are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is making tireless efforts to consolidate the army into the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army armed with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and various kinds of strike means of Korean style.
					
					 Kim Jong Un issued an order of the KPA supreme commander at the emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the WPK convened at night of August 20. This was the show of the invincible spirit and will of the WPK's Songun politics that wields sword against the enemy's dagger and fires artillery shell against the rifle fire.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces that built up their muscle under the care of the Songun brilliant commanders of Paektu can fight any forms of war that the enemies want including a nuclear war.
					
					 "Counter provocation with immediate counterattack, war of aggression with the great just war for national reunification"--this is the principled stand of the DPRK which has no empty talk.
					
					 If the enemies want reckless war and confrontation, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will mercilessly wipe them out to the last one and accomplish without fail the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the service personnel and people to rally close around the Party Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un and work hard to build a thriving socialist country, reunify the country independently and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: National Meeting Clarifies DPRK's Principled Stand
articles.content:
National Meeting Clarifies DPRK's Principled Stand
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture here Monday to mark the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun (military-first) leadership.
					 The meeting clarified the principled stand of the DPRK that it would return immediate counter-strike for provocation and war of justice for war of aggression.
					
					 In the early 1990s when the U.S. ran amuck to provoke a war, urging "nuclear inspection", leader Kim Jong Il issued an order on declaring a quasi-state of war to the whole country and saw to it that the DPRK government announced a statement on its withdrawal from NPT.
					
					 Eventually, the U.S. could not but sign the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework and send its president's letter of guarantee to the DPRK.
					
					 In 2012 when the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime kicked off large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills, Marshal Kim Jong Un made a historic declaration "Counter-strike against provocation, war of justice for national reunification against war of aggression!", thus frustrating the enemies' moves for invasion.
					
					 The situation of the Korean peninsula is now inching closer to the brink of war due to the reckless political and military provocations of the south Korean puppet group. Anyhow, the DPRK will surely emerge victorious and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Trade Unions Give National Folk Music Performance
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Trade Unions Give National Folk Music Performance
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- There took place a national folk music performance "Songun victory is forever" given by officials and members of the trade unions across the country at the Central Hall of Workers on Monday to celebrate the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 The performance began with chorus "Joy of the People". Put on the stage were male quintet and chorus "Our General Is the Best" and other numbers. 
					
					 The performers highly praised the Songun revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il performed in developing the country into an invincible political, ideological and military power and providing an eternal foundation for prosperity of Juche Korea.
					
					 Such numbers as kayagum ensemble "Song of Big Fish Haul" and mixed chorus "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" helped the audience get to know well about the feats of Marshal Kim Jong Un who led the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche to a shining victory and put the people's dream and ideal into practice.
					
					 Put on the stage were also such numbers full of the revolutionary faith and national flavour of the Korean people as female solo and chorus "Let's not abandon revolutionary faith though one may dies" and kayagum ensemble "Moranbong".
					
					 Among the audience were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, officials and members of trade unions and other workers.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Warns S. Korean Conservative Media of Their Anti-DPRK False Propaganda
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Warns S. Korean Conservative Media of Their Anti-DPRK False Propaganda
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Conservative media in south Korea are busy with false propaganda against the DPRK, adding to their crimes recorded in the national history.
					 They claimed the DPRK "promulgated a decree on establishing a donation system" and "the society in the north has turned into the one where loyalty can be bought and sold." They asserted this was a "reliable source" from North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 They even took issue with the newly built Pyongyang Home for the Aged, saying this or that about "old people selected to live there."
					
					 This is a hideous act of tarnishing the image of the dignified DPRK where everything serves its people and an unpardonable insult to their intense loyalty to their leaders.
					
					 These are the worst invectives which can be concocted only by hack writers of the reptile media in south Korea where money is everything.
					
					 The "decree" touted by them has never been promulgated in the DPRK. It is something unthinkable under its popular policy which sets store by the pure mind and conscience of its people and takes warm care of them.
					
					 As far as their loyalty is concerned, it is their spiritual world of conscience and obligation as pure as white gem and as strong as bamboo because they consider their peerlessly great leaders as protectors of their destiny.
					
					 Thanks to the leaders who trust such loyalty and the people's power, Korean-style socialism remains indestructible, backed by the people's resolution to dedicate themselves to the leaders and the inviolable DPRK.
					
					 It is an inveterate bad habit and mode of existence of the conservative media in south Korea to slander the loyalty of the people in the DPRK and the popular policies enforced in it whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 They described the tears shed by the people of the DPRK grieving over the loss of the father of the nation as "forced ones" and painted the Workers' Party of Korea and the state's high commendations of the people who tangibly contributed to the development of the society and country as a "farce for winning popularity."
					
					 It is the main job of the reptile media persons to hurl mud at the DPRK from the back room in Jongro District, Seoul.
					
					 They prolong their remaining days with a petty amount of money paid by the regime in south Korea where money is everything and spirit and personality are sold for making money. Can they properly understand the loyalty of the people of the DPRK to their leader and the true picture of its society where they are believed in as in heaven? 
					
					 Such good-for-nothing will never understand the true spiritual world of the people in the DPRK, no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are behind the smear campaign of the thrice-cursed conservative media. They are making the journalists and anchor persons of the media die-hard liars and slaves of mammonism.
					
					 Pitiful, indeed, is the plight of the U.S. and the puppet regime which have to kick up a smear campaign against the DPRK by mobilizing even such human scum.
					
					 Malignant tongue-lashing of the conservative media is worsening the north-south relations and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 The DPRK will surely force the conservative media such as Channel A and MBC to pay a high price for having dared slander the inviolable political system of the DPRK and loyalty of its people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Its War Crimes and Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Its War Crimes and Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- An article disclosing the crimes committed by the U.S. against humanity during the Korean war was recently posted on Washington Free Beacon, a website in the U.S.
					 The article noted the U.S. committed terrible evil doings against north Korea by dropping more bombs there than those it had dropped in all Pacific battle sites during the Second World War, destroying many cities, killing tens of thousands of innocent civilians and forcing them to suffer without shelter and from starvation.
					
					 This is just a tip of iceberg of the massacres and human rights abuses the U.S. has committed in its mainland, human rights tundra, and other parts of the world for a long period.
					
					 As disclosed, the U.S. had committed horrible genocides against Koreans in various parts of the DPRK in less than two months since the outbreak of the Korean war. In Sinchon County alone, they mercilessly killed by barbarous methods baffling human imagination more than 35 000 people or one fourth of the county's population.
					
					 From the beginning of January to March in 1952 nine regiments of the U.S. air force made a total of 804 sorties to spread germ-carrying insects and things and bombs over 169 areas in the northern half of Korea, an unprecedented germ warfare to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 GIs have killed many innocent peoples of various countries under the pretext of "war on terrorism."
					
					 More than 1 205 000 Iraqis lost their lives and a million were missing for five years since 2003 due to GIs' reckless military operations.
					
					 Over 3 000 Afghans fell victims to the GIs' "war on terrorism" in 2011 alone. Due to the U.S. drone attack under the pretext of "destroying bases of terrorists", many civilians lost their lives in various countries.
					
					 This not withstanding, the U.S. is styling itself a protector of "human rights" and a champion of "humanitarianism" while taking issue with others' "human rights performance."
					
					 U.S. Secretary of State Kerry reportedly urged the staff members of his Department recently to prevent information leakage after a series of top secrets were opened to public by media.
					
					 Among the cases is the one that a high-ranking official of the Department of State in an "annual report" on flesh traffic diluted its contents in an effort to play down the records of a country's flesh traffic, which was opened to public by internet.
					
					 As seen above, all the "human rights reports" the U.S. issues annually by inventing various pretexts to take issue with human rights performance of other countries are no more than sheer fabrications to interfere in the internal affairs of the countries and thus attain its ulterior purposes.
					
					 It has become clearer this time that the "report of the Inquiry Commission" issued last year to take issue with the human rights performance in the DPRK was the one peppered with lies and fabrications.
					
					 No wonder, Kerry is troubled with the leakage of top secrets including the above-said fabrication of information about flesh traffic.
					
					 The U.S. can never cover up its true colors as the worst human rights abuser in the world.

articles.title: National Exhibition of University Students' IT Achievements Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of University Students' IT Achievements Opens
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of IT achievements made by university students opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Monday to mark the Youth Day. 
					 On display there were at least 1 700 pieces of inventions and IT achievements made by university students across the country through their study and scientific pursuit.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and students.
					
					 An opening address was made by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league.

articles.title: New Solar Passenger Ship Laid down in DPRK
articles.content:
New Solar Passenger Ship Laid down in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Nampho Marine Transport Company in the DPRK has recently laid down a new solar passenger ship.
					 This twin-hull ship, completely based on solar power, will run between Nampho City and North and South Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 It is expected that the existing passenger ships can be remodeled into solar-powered ones.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Produce Advanced Rolling Stocks
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Produce Advanced Rolling Stocks
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Employees at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex of the DPRK have turned out in a drive to produce advanced rolling stocks.
					 Won Ung, chief engineer of the Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 The Complex is now working hard for the production of electric locomotives and tube trains of Korean style.
					
					 A work progresses apace to develop a new type of motor for tube train with the help of researchers from universities and the Branch Academy of Railway Science.
					
					 Meanwhile, we strive to further raise the hauling capacity and speed of newly-made alternating-current electric locomotive and better passenger trains.
					
					 All workshops of the Complex keep production facilities in full-capacity operation with a will to contribute to updating the nation's railways.
					
					 In July last supreme leader Kim Jong Un provided field guidance to the Complex to kindle a torch for modernizing railways.

articles.title: Second U-15 International Football Games for Ari Sports Cup Held
articles.content:
Second U-15 International Football Games for Ari Sports Cup Held
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Second U-15 International Football Games for Ari Sports Cup was held at the May Day Stadium in the DPRK from Aug. 21 to 24.
					 It brought together the April 25 Team and the Pyongyang International Football School Team of the DPRK, the Atletico Sorocaba Team of Brazil, the Team of Uzbekistan, the Kunming City Team of China, the Team of Croatia and the Kyonggi Provincial Team and the South Korean Kangwon Provincial Team.
					
					 Divided into A and B groups, they played league matches.
					
					 Top two teams from each group-the April 25 Team, the Atletico Sorocaba Team, the Pyongyang International Football School Team and the Team of Uzbekistan-played semi-finals.
					
					 The April 25 Team and the Pyongyang International Football School Team advanced to the finals.
					
					 The April 25 Team placed first, the Pyongyang International Football School Team second the Atletico Sorocaba Team third.
					
					 Cup and medals were awarded to the successful teams and individual prizes to the excellent players and coaches.

articles.title: Hideous Crimes Committed by Japanese Imperialists in Past
articles.content:
Hideous Crimes Committed by Japanese Imperialists in Past
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Seventy years has passed since the sinking of "Ukishima-maru", a naval transport ship of the imperial Japanese army, which killed thousands of Koreans who were taken to Japan for forced labor.
					 The Japanese imperialists blew up the ship on a voyage on August 24, 1945 under the government's plan for genocide of Koreans.
					
					 After occupying Korea, Japan had persistently pursued the policy of obliterating the Korean nation and many Koreans were slaughtered during its colonial rule of 40-odd years.
					
					 The Japanese imperialist aggressors killed in a cruel way more than 150 000 Korean people from the summer of 1906 to 1911, 30 000 in 1920 and 23 000 in September 1923. In 1940-1944 more than 60 000 Koreans were killed while being forced to work at Japan's coal mines.
					
					 However, Japan has not yet made a sincere apology for those hideous crimes, denying and distorting its crime-woven past.
					
					 Such attempt fans up the Korean people's enmity toward Japan.

articles.title: DPRK Red Guards Ready for Combat Action
articles.content:
DPRK Red Guards Ready for Combat Action
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea on the prevailing situation roused all the people in the DPRK to an action for retaliation all at once.
					 The Worker-Peasant Red Guards (WPRG) and the Young Red Guards (YRG) are now in full combat readiness, together with the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Jo Chun Haeng, a WPRG member of the Jangphung County Motor Station in North Hwanghae Province, told KCNA:
					
					 Now is the time for us to vent our pent-up grudge on the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces hell-bent on the anti-DPRK military provocations. 
					
					 Once an order is given, we will take the lead in an offensive action against the provokers, together with the KPA.
					
					 YRG members across the country are eagerly volunteering to join the army when it will advance toward the south.
					
					 An Myong Il, a senior instructor of the youth league committee at Ryugyong Senior Secondary School in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 Little students of my school are little different from adults in the retaliatory spirit.
					
					 If an order of attack is given, all of them as YRG members will advance southward before anybody else to destroy the provokers.

articles.title: DPRK People Confident of Final Victory
articles.content:
DPRK People Confident of Final Victory
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula due to the military confrontation between the north and the south.
					 Anyhow, civilians in the DPRK keep their living on a normal footing with confidence in their final victory.
					
					 Public welfare service establishments are daily crowded with visitors and students and pupils are seen studying hard at all schools across the country.
					
					 "I am not afraid of a war and I am sure of our victory in the showdown", Han Myong Suk, a Pyongyang citizen, told KCNA.
					
					 O Hyon Il, a peasant of the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang said that the final victory is in store for the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un, the iron-willed brilliant commander.

articles.title: DPRK People Boost Production with Spirit Displayed in 1950s
articles.content:
DPRK People Boost Production with Spirit Displayed in 1950s
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- All civilians in the DPRK have turned out in a drive to speed up the production and construction in the same spirit of annihilating the enemies as displayed during the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Amid the resounding of wartime songs, industrial workers across the country are devotedly working to achieve signal economic successes.
					
					 Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, Pukchang Thermal Power Complex and other electricity producers strive to raise the output.
					
					 The machine-building industrial workers finished the production of equipment and facilities needed for the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station and set about manufacturing of equipment for major projects including the construction of Sci-Tech Complex.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex boost the production every day, accelerating the manufacturing of facilities and equipment needed to update the Juche-based iron-making process and the railways and build a geothermal equipment producer.
					
					 Such high working spirit can be felt on co-op farms across the country.

articles.title: DPRK Shows No Mercy to Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK Shows No Mercy to Provokers
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK now strongly demand that deadly strikes be inflicted on the south Korean military gangsters who dared provoked it with the backing of the United States.
					 Historically, the DPRK has punished without mercy any aggressors and provokers.
					
					 In 1968 when the U.S. spy ship "Pueblo" was captured by the Korean People's Army for its intrusion into territorial waters of the DPRK for espionage, the U.S. amassed huge armed forces in and around the Korean Peninsula to put military pressure upon it.
					
					 The DPRK responded to such action with the tough stand of retaliation for retaliation and all-out war for all-out war, and eventually the U.S. could not but make a written apology to it.
					
					 In April 1969, the DPRK mercilessly downed a U.S. large-sized spy plane, EC-121, which flew into its territorial sky for espionage aimed to provoke a war.
					
					 When U.S. troops committed the Panmunjom incident on August 18, 1976, the KPA civil policemen heavily punished the provokers.
					
					 Such instances include the case of shooting down a U.S. army helicopter in December 1994 and the Yonphyong Island incident that took place a few years ago.
					
					 All the cases clearly show that any provokers are doomed to destruction.

articles.title: Retaliatory Spirit Speed up Economic Construction in DPRK
articles.content:
Retaliatory Spirit Speed up Economic Construction in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The retaliatory spirit has raised the speed of economic construction in the DPRK.
					 All fields of projects across the country turned into a battle site all at once after the urgent report of the Korean People's Army Supreme Command on the south Korean military gangsters' recent military provocation.
					
					 Signal achievements are reported in succession from the country's major construction sites.
					
					 Builders of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station finished adjusting the area around the lower part of the dam of Power Station No.1 in only two days. They removed more than 10 000 cubic meters of earth in the area of 75 000 square meters in a day.
					
					 Those undertaking the construction of a bridge at Power Station No. 2 completed cofferdam project in two days.
					
					 Preparations for operation have entered the final stage at several power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River.
					
					 Great innovations are also being effected in the construction of Sci-Tech Complex, Mirae Scientists Street, South Hwanghae provincial waterway project and many other projects.
					
					 Meanwhile, a lot of buildings have been completed each day in Sepho tableland where the construction of a large-size stockbreeding base is under way.

articles.title: Inhabitants in Kangdong Area of Pyongyang Swear Revenge on Provokers
articles.content:
Inhabitants in Kangdong Area of Pyongyang Swear Revenge on Provokers
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The recent shelling on military posts of the DPRK by the south Korean puppet military gangsters vexed all its people, including the officials and employees of the Kangdong Area Coal-mining Complex.
					 Enraged at such reckless provocation, 2 140 coal miners of the Complex had volunteered to serve in the army until 17:00 of August 21 and the number of volunteers increased to more than 3 500 until 11:00 of next day.
					
					 Meanwhile, all its officials and employees turned out in a drive to radically raise the coal output under the slogan of "Display loyalty to the Party with increased coal production!"
					
					 In a day after the emergency enlarged meeting of the Workers' Party of Korea held to cope with the prevailing grave situation, coal mines of the Complex carried out their daily quota at 150 percent in the spirit of wiping out the provokers.

articles.title: Frontline Areas Pervaded with Spirit of Annihilating Enemies
articles.content:
Frontline Areas Pervaded with Spirit of Annihilating Enemies
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- North Hwanghae Province, one of the frontline areas in the DPRK, is in a full quasi-state of war.
					 Posters calling for exterminating enemies can be seen in different parts of the province with wartime songs resounding.
					
					 On August 22, there took place at the square of Sariwon City a meeting of students to petition for military service in hearty response to the spirit of the emergency enlarged meeting of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Military Commission and the order given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 That day alone, 180 000 young people in the province volunteered to join the Korean People's Army (KPA). And the number of volunteers is increasing with the passage of time.
					
					 Women in the province devote their all to assisting the servicepersons with the spirit as displayed by those of a village on the Bank of the Nam during the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The aged and schoolchildren have called on KPA soldiers to mow down the military provokers without mercy, expressing their resolve to fight in the same trench shoulder to shoulder with the servicepersons.
					
					 Meanwhile, the hatred against the enemies aroused all the workers and peasants of the province to a campaign for increased production.
					
					 Ryu Un Ryong, a builder of the North Hwanghae Provincial Baby Home, said that a sacred war against the provokers is just for rosy future of the country.

articles.title: Frontline Medical Institutions Ready for Action
articles.content:
Frontline Medical Institutions Ready for Action
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Frontline hospitals at all levels in the DPRK have pushed ahead with preparations for field medical service to cope with the prevailing situation.
					 Taking the lead in this work are the Kangwon and North Hwanghae provincial people's hospitals, Kaesong City People's Hospital and Cholwon and Thosan county people's hospitals.
					
					 They fully secured medicines, medical instruments and other materials for field treatment, while preparing medical equipment for full operation.
					
					 Meanwhile, training courses are given for administering first-aid treatment in battlefields.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Try to Revive Militarism
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Try to Revive Militarism
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Japan is intensifying the moves to remilitarize itself, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on August 19. 
					 The Defense Ministry of Japan increased defense budget for next year to be the biggest in history. It was reported that the ministry earmarked about 5 trillion and 91.1 billion yen as a military fund for next year. 
					
					 In recent ten years Japan has spent huge amounts of military fund to massively import MV-22 Ospreys from the U.S., introduce weapons and deploy the "Self-Defense Forces" for action. 
					
					 Japan has become desperate to remilitarize itself by craftily increasing budget under the pretext of defense every year. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Japan is getting more shameless to distort the history. 
					
					 The south Korean Seoul Sinmun on August 20 disclosed that Japan is openly showing its ambition for grabbing Tok Islets and denying its past history of aggression. 
					
					 According to the paper, the Foreign Ministry of Japan on August 19 planned to publish textbooks in 46 languages to internationally expand its brigandish assertion over the issues of Tok Islets and the past history. 
					
					 Japan has already named in textbooks Tok Islets "part of Japan's inalienable territory" and deleted part dealing with the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Bring Down DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Bring Down DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has gone to extremes in its moves to stifle the DPRK by hurling the south Korean puppet forces into confrontation, conflict, plot-hatching and war actions against the backdrop of madcap Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills which started on Aug. 17. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an article in this regard: 
					
					 The gravity of the war drills lies in that they are aimed at a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK with the U.S.-south Korea combined division and huge war hardware for aggression involved with their  operation mission to "eliminate the headquarters" and "occupy Pyongyang" and all the operation commanding posts deployed.
					
					 The final goal of the U.S. Korea policy is to bring down the social system in the DPRK and occupy its inviolable land as it is the arch criminal stoking deep-rooted hostility and distrust in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to clearly understand that it can never bring down the DPRK. 
					
					 Looking back on history, the U.S. sustained repeated setbacks in face of heavy blows of the Korean People's Army while running riot, counting on its strong muscle. 
					
					 Not only during the Korean War but in the spy ship Pueblo incident, Panmunjom incident, the case of shooting down a copter in December 1994, etc. the U.S. always made apologies and signed surrender documents. 
					
					 Tragedy is that the U.S. is not awakened from its daydream, pursuant to its hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a war in the end, far from drawing a lesson taught by its bitter defeat in the history, the DPRK will bring an irrevocable disaster and disgrace to it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Forces' Provocation Deliberate and Premeditated Move for War against North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Forces' Provocation Deliberate and Premeditated Move for War against North
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A touch-and-go situation is prevailing in the area along the Military Demarcation Line. The south Korean puppet forces are chiefly to blame for this grave situation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The politically-motivated military provocations of the puppet forces are undisguised acts to hurt the DPRK's dignity, bring down its social system, grab its inviolable territory and start a war against it. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' policy of confrontation with the DPRK and their ceaseless war drills against it were the main cause of the recent serious artillery shelling.
					
					 We cannot overlook the fact that their serious provocation to the DPRK was timed to coincide with the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills.
					
					 It is a sinister scenario of the puppet forces to perpetrate provocations to the north, escalate tension and thus develop the UFG into an all-out war against the DPRK.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the U.S. and puppet warmongers are operating the combined operational system in accordance with the already worked out "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" after making armed provocation to the north.
					
					 The desperate moves being stepped up by  the U.S. and puppet group of traitors to ignite a nuclear war against the north to wreck the peace and stability on the peninsula are touching off towering hatred among the service personnel and people of the DPRK and heightening their resolution to take a thousand-fold revenge. 
					
					 It is their steadfast will to mercilessly wipe out the provocateurs at once.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Confrontation Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Confrontation Hysteria
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye appeared at the command of the puppet third field army in the western sector of the front on August 21 at which she took pain to trumpet about "a principle of resolute counteraction" while "hearing a report on the present situation" and "examining posture."
					 Traitor Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense, in a "statement to the people" on August 21 claimed that broadcasts for psychological warfare were a "proper step" to cope with the "north's mine provocation." He went the lengths of crying out for "merciless punishment" and "action to force the north to pay a high price."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says this was a dangerous criminal act to ignite a war against the north by building up public opinion at home and abroad on the "mine explosion" case and the "north's  shelling" incident faked up by the puppet forces and escalating the confrontation with the north under such pretext.
					
					 Their confrontation hysteria has reached its height, the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					 All administrative organs have been converted into alert duty system, puppet army soldiers are banned from going out and staying out and the Intelligence Service, police and other fascist repressive machines are taking alert measures across south Korea. This hysteric racket can be seen only on the eve of a war.
					
					 Worse still, the puppet group is operating "the joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" in league with its American master and, at the same time, hatching a plot to lead the present situation to an all-out war in a moment by introducing the U.S. imperialist aggressors in case an armed conflict occurs between the north and the south.
					
					 The puppet forces should not forget even in a dream that the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army is leveling their guns at the puppet forces.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean War Maniacs Hell-bent on DPRK-targeted War Drills
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean War Maniacs Hell-bent on DPRK-targeted War Drills
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are getting frantic with their provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills against the DPRK.
					 After kicking off the drills in league with the U.S. imperialists on Aug. 17 the puppet forces hurled civilians into the drills across south Korea including Seoul.
					
					 After an emergency call-up was made, lawmakers were busy staging a drill at the building of the "National Assembly" together with police commandos and fire fighting agency and other relevant organs under the simulated conditions of all forms of terror attacks.
					
					 The puppet regime was busy forcing civilians across south Korea to undergo such training as taking shelter and drill for coping with wartime.
					
					 It even hurled children into military drills.
					
					 The south Korean puppet defense agency was busy with a drill for urgently delivering war supplies from abroad by use of transport planes of the air force under the simulated conditions of war.
					
					 Brass hats of the south Korean puppet army visited areas along the front, timed to coincide with the beginning of the war rehearsal.
					
					 The 36th Infantry Division of the puppet army hurled huge reserve forces into the drills for executing the "operation plan for defending homeland." 
					
					 The Second Fleet of the south Korean puppet navy, in league with the second air brigade under the U.S. Second Division present in south Korea, staged madcap drills for compulsory transport in Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province on August 18.
					
					 The U.S. Second Air Brigade staged drills at a firing range in Pochon, Kyonggi Province on August 21.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has reached the brink of war due to ceaseless war drills of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet war maniacs.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea Ratchet up Military Tension
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea Ratchet up Military Tension
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers are rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense, according to media of south Korea and the U.S. 
					 They pushed the Watch Condition 3 up to Watch Condition 2 to intensify watch on the DPRK by the use of reconnaissance satellites, reconnaissance planes, land spy equipment, etc. and increased the number of agents for the collection and analysis of information. 
					
					 They urgently dispatched warships and planes capable of combating submarines and expanded patrol operation area and capabilities, thus escalating tension. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet war maniacs deployed MLRS of the U.S. forces and south Korean puppet army in the frontline area, continuously hurling armed forces for preemptive attack in the forefront area. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are going to stage offensive drills including the combined firepower drills with the involvement of big firepower weapons. 
					
					 Owing to the provocation racket of the war maniacs, the situation of the Korean Peninsula is worsening hourly.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Run Amuck for Naval Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Run Amuck for Naval Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- It was revealed that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers have intensified the naval joint military maneuvers designed to invade the north, according to the south Korean KBS on Monday.
					 According to a "report on security strategy in Asia-Pacific" released by the U.S. Defense Department, the U.S. and puppet warmongers have conducted joint military drills several times in the waters off the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of "coping with submarine combat".
					
					 Such drills, in particular, were waged in the course of the dangerous joint military exercises such as Key Resolve.
					
					 The fact clearly proves once again that it is the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces, who are to blame for worsening the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Hold Large Meeting in Seoul
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Hold Large Meeting in Seoul
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- At least 15 000 south Korean workers held a meeting in the plaza before the Seoul City Office on Aug. 22 in protest against the puppet group's move for restructuring the labor market.
					 Speakers said that they could not repress their anger at the "government", ruling party and conservative media labeling the workers demanding stable job and wage increase "extremists".
					
					 They declared they would certainly break shackles such as lay-off and wage cut by their concerted efforts and seek the earliest possible solutions of matters including cut down of working hours and abolition of the part-time job.
					
					 Noting that they would never become puppets of the "government", they appealed to all the workers to struggle in a do-or-die spirit.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Police Search Office of Progressive Body
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Police Search Office of Progressive Body
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Ryongsan Police Station of south Korea on August 18 searched Jinbo Network, a progressive civic organization.
					 An internet subscriber of south Korea posted on the website of the Federation of Peasants Associations an article accusing Park Geun Hye in November, 2013, angered by the present puppet regime which revived the "yusin" dictatorship and fascist repressive rule.
					
					 The police stretched tentacles of suppression to the progressive organization managing the website of the federation, claiming that it is tracking the person who posted an article on the website.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated Abroad
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Russian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Russian Figures
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Events for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation took place in Russia.
					 There were a meeting in Ulyanovsk City, opening ceremonies of the Korean book, photo and art exhibition in a city of Moscow Region and   a city of Maritime Territory, a lecture in a city of Karelia and a stamp exhibition in Moscow from August 13 to 20.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos documenting the revolutionary life and exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were their works, books, photos and stamps introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and art works showing the creative talents of Koreans.
					
					 The secretary of the Ulyanovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation lauded the President as the tender-hearted father of the Korean people who converted the DPRK into an invincible socialist power.
					
					 The chairman of the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region said that the President is the benefactor of the rebirth of the Korean nation who founded the Juche idea and Songun idea in the first period of revolution and liberated the country through armed struggle.
					
					 The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia lauded the President as the benefactor of the national rebirth and distinguished leader who glorified the Korean revolution with victories and glories
					
					 The president of the Russian National Philatelists Academy expressed the belief that the Korean people would gain bigger success in the struggle for building a powerful nation and achieving the reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Moscow State.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Serbian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Serbian Figure
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Lazar Aksentijevich, chairman of the preparatory committee of the New Yugoslav Communist Party for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Korea's liberation, posted an article on the website of the party on August 14.
					 The article said:
					
					 On August 15, 1945 President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, organized and led the anti-Japanese armed struggle and delivered Korean people from colonial slavery.
					
					 He entertained a noble idea to liberate the country in his teens and embarked on the road of revolution.
					
					 He laid out the line of armed struggle based on the Juche idea and Songun idea and thus the national liberation struggle of Korea could develop along the new road.
					
					 He organized the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, 1932 and conducted the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists.   He also founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland with a plan for accomplishing the historic cause of the country's liberation by fusing the broad masses into one.
					
					 Thanks to the founding of the Association of the Restoration of the Fatherland, the national liberation struggle of Korea could dynamically advance, firmly united under the same banner, finally liberating the country under his leadership.
					
					 The exploits performed by him who gave the pleasure of the country's liberation to the Korean people and greatly encouraged the world anti-imperialist national liberation struggle by leading the anti-Japanese revolutionary war to victory will always be remembered by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 The Russian paper Tsumenskaya Pravda on Aug. 6 carried an article titled "For building country of people" with the photo dealing with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, picture of the Monument to Party Founding and photos showing the might of the heroic Korean People's Army. 
					
					 The article said:
					
					 General Kim Il Sung founded the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, 1945 on the basis of the solid organizational and ideological foundation he laid in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 He developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces and founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 9, 1948. 
					
					 He built a powerful independent and sovereign state after abolishing the remnants of the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists in a short span of time. 
					
					 The Mongolian paper Odriin Sonin on Aug. 15 carried an article with the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung. It said:
					
					 He led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and achieved the liberation of the country. 
					
					 He turned Korea into the invincible socialist fortress independent, self-supporting and self-defensive. 
					
					 The DPRK has never made a step back from the way chosen by itself but firmly defended its own ideology, social system and cause for 70 years. 
					
					 The Zambian paper Post on Aug. 13 carried an article with the photo of the President.

articles.title: Russian Body Flails S. Korean Puppet Group's Provocation against DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Body Flails S. Korean Puppet Group's Provocation against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK issued a statement on August 22 to flail the south Korean puppet group's politically-motivated military provocations against the DPRK.
					 It is very clear that the south Korean authorities' provocations are being committed at the connivance and under the patronage of the U.S. ruling quarters, the statement said.
					
					 The U.S. feels extreme uneasiness at the defensive capabilities and sovereignty of the DPRK growing stronger day by day, it noted.
					
					 The hostile forces' provocations will bring grave consequences to the peace and security not only on the Korean Peninsula but in Asia-Pacific, it said, adding:
					
					 We fully support the just steps of the DPRK to cope with the provocations and strongly demand the south Korean authorities stop the reckless provocations at once.
					
					 The people in Northeast Asian countries will ensure regional peace and strengthen friendship and cooperation among them.

articles.title: Palestinian Political Party, Organization Condemn S. Korean Warmongers' Provocations against DPRK
articles.content:
Palestinian Political Party, Organization Condemn S. Korean Warmongers' Provocations against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Palestinian Popular Struggle Front and the Palestinian Resistance Alliance released a joint statement on August 23 denouncing the south Korean puppet warmongers' military provocations against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the Palestinian Popular Struggle Front and all the resistance forces of Palestine bitterly condemn military provocations and psychological warfare staged by the south Korean puppet army against the DPRK.
					
					 The hysteric acts committed by the south Korean puppet army at present will be foiled by the just struggle of the great leadership, brave army and strong people of the DPRK, the statement noted.

articles.title: French Body Demands Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
French Body Demands Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- An article denouncing the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises was posted by the France-Korea Friendship Association on its website on August 16.
					 The article said:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is aggravating seriously due to the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 The DPRK, regarding the saber-rattling as a prelude to a new Korean war, clarified that if the enemies ignite a war of aggression in the end, it would fight it out to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK Foreign Ministry declared that the DPRK has military muscle enough to fight any war wanted by the U.S. unlike in the 1950s.
					
					 If the U.S. and its followers truly want peace on the Korean Peninsula, they should halt the Ulji Freedom Guardian.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Parties, Organizations and Figures Support DPRK's Self-Defensive Measures
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Parties, Organizations and Figures Support DPRK's Self-Defensive Measures
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and political figures of Bangladesh in statements on Aug. 22 and 23 supported the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to smash the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group's moves to ignite a war.
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh expressed serious concern over the fact that south Korea made fabrications in the area along the Military Demarcation Line and resumed the anti-DPRK broadcasts for psychological warfare, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh bitterly denounced the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group for their reckless war provocation moves and expressed firm solidarity for the Korean people in their struggle for defending the social system chosen by themselves and the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist) said that the U.S. and south Korea kicked off the joint military drills and made fabrications to lead the situation on the peninsula to an extreme phase at a time when all the service personnel of the DPRK are carrying on the dynamic struggle to greet the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as a grand festival.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League who double as chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, expressed the belief that the DPRK government and people will surely win in the confrontation with provocateurs, adding they are bound to meet a miserable end.
					
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said that progressives aspiring after independence come to know well that the escalating situation on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' hostile policy, war drills and continuous arms provocation.

articles.title: Foreign Political Parties, Bodies Denounce U.S. and S. Korea for Provocation against DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Political Parties, Bodies Denounce U.S. and S. Korea for Provocation against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties and bodies on Aug. 22 made public statements in support of the just cause of the Korean people for smashing the provocative moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces against the DPRK. 
					 The Bulgarian Communists Union said the situation on the Korean Peninsula has been pushed to the brink of war as the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group restarted anti-DPRK broadcasts as part of its stepped-up psychological warfare. 
					
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association extended solidarity to the struggle of the Korean people to destroy the persistent provocative moves of the hostile forces and defend sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said that it is the trite method of the preceding south Korean rulers to cook up shocking cases in the area along the Military Demarcation Line and divert elsewhere the public attention at home and abroad to seek the way out whenever they faced crises. 
					
					 Igor Yurisik, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, said the south Korean authorities' provocation against the DPRK is very serious as it was made at a time when Korea greeted the 70th anniversary of its liberation from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists. We do not want to see a new war breaking out on the Korean Peninsula, he added.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce Japanese Right Conservative Forces for Trying to Cover up Past Crimes
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce Japanese Right Conservative Forces for Trying to Cover up Past Crimes
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement denouncing the moves of the Japanese right conservative forces to cover up the past crimes on August 16, the next day of seven decades after the defeat of the Japanese imperialists. 
					 It said that Abe's "statement to mark the 70th anniversary of the end of WWII" dose not show sincere acknowledgement and apology for the crimes Japan committed against the Korean people. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' 40-odd-year long colonial rule over Korea was the most hideous and brutal one, it said, and went on:
					
					 Five years after the defeat of the Second World War, Japan took part in the Korean War under the connivance and patronage of the U.S.
					
					 Japan is persistently oppressing Koreans in Japan while violating their rights. 
					
					 Abe's "statement" is an insult to the Korean people. 
					
					 This time Abe disclosed the militarist, violent and aggressive nature of Japan. 
					
					 His deceptive "statement" is the mockery of the people who were forced into slavery and lost their lives owing to the aggression by Japan. 
					
					 Japan should make a sincere apology and reparation before the Korean people and clearly settle the past crimes.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause for National Reunification Supported by Slovenian Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause for National Reunification Supported by Slovenian Figure
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, released a statement in support of peaceful reunification of Korea on Aug. 15 to observe the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Korean people have advanced positive and innovative proposals for national reunification and made strenuous efforts to implement them for 70 years since the country's liberation.
					
					 But global peace and security were imperiled and north-south dialogue was spoiled due to the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean regime to perpetuate the national division.
					
					 The south Korean regime should stop all hostile joint military drills with the U.S. in order to mend its relations with the north.
					
					 When hostile military actions completely cease to create an atmosphere of reconciliation and unity, all inter-Korean issues would be settled at will of all Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean regime should positively respond to the stand of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to pave an avenue of improving the north-south relations by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Order Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Order Supported by British Organizations
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Aug. 21 in support of an order issued by Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, at an emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said that they fully support the order issued by Kim Jong Un that frontline large combined units of the KPA should enter a wartime state to be fully combat ready to launch surprise operations and the area along the front be put in a semi-war state from 17:00 on Aug. 21.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The recent provocation by the U.S. and south Korean puppet group has gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces who have systematically committed provocations against the DPRK perpetrated such reckless action as firing 36 shells at the KPA civil police posts on Aug. 20.
					
					 As a result, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to a war.
					
					 The order issued by Kim Jong Un under such a grave situation is a powerful and resolute step for holding back the provokers.
					
					 We absolutely support the recent step for defending the sovereignty of the DPRK, birthplace of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Aggression Moves of U.S., S. Korean Authorities Denounced by Syrian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates
articles.content:
Aggression Moves of U.S., S. Korean Authorities Denounced by Syrian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Syrian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates released a statement on Sunday to denounce the aggressive moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stifle the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The psychological warfare being conducted by south Korea in the area along the Military Demarcation Line between the north and the south is destroying the security and stability of the DPRK.
					
					 Strongly denouncing such military drills and the psychological warfare against the DPRK, the Syrian Arab Republic demanded an immediate stop to them.
					
					 Syria extends full solidarity to the leadership and people of the DPRK and sees that all the possible measures would be taken to stop the provocation acts of the U.S. and south Korea and remove the danger of a war from the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 If the peace and stability are harassed on the peninsula, it would seriously affect the peace and stability of the world.

articles.title: Efectuado contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea
Phanmunjom, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Termino el dia 24 el contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur, iniciado el dia 22 en Phanmunjom. 
					Participaron alli, por la parte Norte, el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y Kim Yang Gon, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, y por la parte Sur, Kim Kwan Jin, jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad Nacional de Chongwadae, y Hong Yong Phyo, ministro de Unificacion.
					
					Ambas partes discutieron con seriedad los problemas de principios que se presentan en prevenir la confrontacion y choques armados y fomentar el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales y publicaron la informacion conjunta.
					
					El texto senala:
					
					Tuvo lugar desde el dia 22 hasta el 24 de agosto de 2015 en Phanmunjom el contacto urgente de alto nivel entre el Norte y el Sur. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes, por la parte Norte, el jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hwang Pyong So, y el secretario del Comite Central del Partido, Kim Yang Gon, y por la parte Sur, el jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad Nacional de Chongwadae, Kim Kwan Jin, y el ministro de Unificacion, Hong Yong Phyo. 
					
					En la ocasion ambas partes discutieron los problemas para eliminar la aguda tension militar aumentada en los ultimos dias entre el Norte y el Sur y desarrollar las relaciones intercoreanas y acordaron como lo siguiente:
					
					1. El Norte y el Sur acordaron reanudar cuanto antes en Pyongyang o Seul las conversaciones de autoridades para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y realizar en el futuro el dialogo y negociaciones en varios dominios. 
					
					2. La parte Norte expreso lastima por la herida de los militares surcoreanos por la explosion de mina recien ocurrida en la zona desmilitarizada al sur de la demarcacion militar. 
					
					3. Mientras no ocurra un incidente anormal, la parte Sur suspendera desde las 12:00 del dia 25 de agosto todas las radiodifusiones en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					4. Al mismo tiempo, la parte Norte eliminara el estado de preguerra.
					
					5. El Norte y el Sur decidieron efectuar el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto lunar) de este ano y continuarlo en el futuro, asi como sostener a principios de septiembre el contacto de trabajo de la cruz roja por el respecto. 
					
					6. El Norte y el Sur acordaron dinamizar el intercambio civil en diferentes esferas.

articles.title: Acto central por el Dia de Songun
articles.content:
Acto central por el Dia de Songun
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 55o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (25 de agosto).
					Asistieron alli Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Pak Yong Sik y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de mando del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en esta capital, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organismos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de los organos, fabricas y empresas en la capital y los ameritados laborales.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, quien subrayo como sigue:
					
					El 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dejo la huella de la direccion sobre la revolucion en la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su, lo que devino un evento historico que anuncio la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria de Songun y la nueva partida de la direccion mediante el Songun.
					
					Asi, la revolucion del Songun continuo y el EPC se ha fortalecido ininterrumpidamente como ejercito del lider y del partido y se abrio la nueva epoca de la revolucion de Juche  que sale siempre victoriosa bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					Durante mas de 50 anos, el Dirigente antepuso siempre los asuntos militares y condujo a la victoria la batalla por la defensa del socialismo tomando el EPC como pilar y grueso de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					A mediados de la decada de 1990 cuando llegaban a climax las maniobras de los enemigos para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC, el Dirigente inspecciono el puesto Tabaksol (pinito), declarando asi su invariable voluntad de tomar firmemente el fusil de la revolucion hasta cuando se eliminen todos los imperialistas de este mundo y seguir siempre por el camino del Songun.
					
					El Dirigente ilumino la filosofia de fusil, segun la cual la revolucion se inicia, se avanza y se lleva a feliz termino por las fuerzas armadas, y el principio del Songun de que el ejercito es precisamente el partido, el Estado y el pueblo y formulo y sistematizo la teoria politica del Songun.
					
					Bajo la dinamica direccion del Dirigente, el EPC se ha hecho ejercito selecto en la ideologia y la conviccion y poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu sin rival y la industria belica de la RPDC se ha fortalecido en la potente industria capaz de producir a su antojo cualquiera arma ultramoderna.
					
					Se han realizado en la nueva etapa alta la modernizacion de todo el ejercito y el armamento de todo el pueblo y establecido el sistema de defensa de todo el pueblo y todo el estado, y asi la RPDC se ha intensificado como baluarte inexpugnable. 
					
					Brillaran para siempre las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente quien enarbolando la bandera del Songun dedico toda su vida con la ardiente voluntad patriotica para preparar el invencible poderio militar y la fuerza de la gran unidad del ejercito y el pueblo y asentar la dignidad de la patria y el pueblo en la cima de la historia nacional. 
					
					La idea revolucionaria del Songun y las proezas del Dirigente se llevan adelante tambien hoy en dia gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, gran hombre sin igual del monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal dedica todos sus esfuerzos por consolidar el EPC como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del  monte Paektu armadas con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el del viento cortante del Paektu y equipadas con diversificados medios de ataque a estilo coreano.
					
					En la reunion ampliada de emergencia de la Comision Militar Central del PTC convocada el pasado dia 20, se emitio la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC, lo cual deviene la demostracion del impetu y la voluntad invictos de la politica del Songun del PTC. 
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, crecidas bajo el regazo de los geniales comandantes del Songun del Paektu, son capaces de responder a cualquier modo de guerra que impongan los enemigos inclusive la guerra nuclear. 
					
					"!A la provocacion con el inmediato contragolpe, a la guerra de agresion con la gran guerra justa para la reunificacion de la patria!", esto es nuestra posicion de principios que no sabe las palabras vanas.
					
					Si los enemigos optan por fin el camino de la imprudente provocacion de guerra agresiva y la frenetica confrontacion, nuestras fuerzas revolucionarias arrasaran sin piedad a todos los enemigos sin dejar ni uno que pueda firmar el acta de capitulacion y lograran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Al finalizar, el informante exhorto a todos a luchar vigorosamente por la construccion de un estado prospero socialista, la reunificacion independiente de la patria y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche uniendose mas compactamente en torno al Comite Central del PTC encabezado por el Mariscal y levantando mas alto la bandera del Songun.
